room_title: Escape room "The Lost Will" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
review: Played the Lost Will room - a total blast! It was challenging and super fun all at the same time. An added bonus is the owners are awesome people, definitely check this out and support Riddle Me Roanoke!!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Will" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
review: Love the Lost Will room! I was in a group of three, including my son, and we were able to finish with 6 minutes left. Absolutely recommend. Can't wait to go back to do the other rooms. This is a very unique experience for people in Roanoke.

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Will" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
review: Went with a group of friends to Riddle Me Roanoke. What a great time. We played the Last Will room. It was just the right amount of difficulty! If you haven't tried an escape room yet, you should check it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Will" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
review: First experience of this type for this family. We only had what we had seen on tv and movies to go by. The family-owners are wonderful and help make the experience that much better. We actually managed to finish "Lost Will" with 4 secs to spare with the help of our 2 brilliant tweeners!

room_title: Escape room "The Lost Will" by Riddle Me Roanoke in Roanoke
review: Great experience! We have been to another escape room in Baltimore and we loved this one just as much. The atmosphere was clean and the room (the last will) was well thought out. My daughter was ready to go in and do another one. Thank you for the fun.
